item.title: How to add an unipban command.. i have an ipban, but dont know how to add un
item.dc:creator: @Bonjour Bonjour
item.description:
@Bonjour wrote:

can someone tell me how to make a command to unipban, or unipmute, i have an ipmute/ipban command but i need to find an uncommand for it, here is the commands that i need “un” for

         if (command.startsWith("ipmute") && playerRights >= 1) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(7);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);



        if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 3) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(6);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
